remarks: Build a bijection between restricted abstract builders, given a bijection between the base classes, deduction version.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Aug-2018.)
statement:
f1oresrab.1 $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> C ) $.
f1oresrab.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : A -1-1-onto-> B ) $.
f1oresrab.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A /\ y = C ) -> ( ch <-> ps ) ) $.
f1oresrab $p |- ( ph -> ( F |` { x e. A | ps } ) : { x e. A | ps } -1-1-onto-> { y e. B | ch } ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C y $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x y $.
$d ps y $.
